description: Validator for the offnet callflow data object

bypass_e164.description: Use the original requested number instead of normalizing to E164

caller_id_type.description: Which configured caller-id to use (key in the 'caller_id' object)

in.description: Custom SIP Headers to be applied to calls inbound to Kazoo from the endpoint

out.description: Custom SIP Headers to be applied to calls outbound from Kazoo to the endpoint

custom_sip_headers.description: A property list of SIP headers

do_not_normalize.description: Use the original requested number instead of normalizing; otherwise try to apply the endpoint's dialplan to the requested number

dynamic_flags.description: List of function names (or 'zone') that are called on the Call record to populate the 'flags' array sent to the resource(s) for matching

emit_account_id.description: Toggles whether to put the account id in the SIP packets

format_from_uri.description: If true, puts the account realm in the From header

from_uri_realm.description: Override the From realm in the SIP packets

hunt_account_id.description: When using local resources, use this account instead of the account making the call (useful for resellers)

ignore_early_media.description: Toggle whether to ignore early media

outbound_flags.description: List of flags to use when matching resources to route the call

resource_type.description: sets a custom resource type for the published amqp message

ringback.description: Tone or file to play while waiting for the leg to be answered

skip_module.description: When set to true this callflow action is skipped, advancing to the wildcard branch (if any)

timeout.description: How long, in seconds, to wait for the call to be answered

to_did.description: Statically set the DID to dial

use_local_resources.description: Toggle whether to use the account's (or hunt_account_id's) resources vs the system resources
